title: Propagand at the end spoiled it for me
review: Spoiler alert !The story was good, but i really don't buy the last part of it. When they state this:'This case now serves as a case study for the procurement department of Pentagon'.This states a big red flag for me as there were also used American war equipment in the film (Hum Vees, helicopters etc) which probably means that the Pentagon had a editors role in the making.Another red flag is the general bookkeeping faults at the Pentagon. (lookup 'missing trillions pentagon' with google)
